titleStmt.title: A godly inuectiue in the defence of the Gospell against such as murmure and woorke what thei can that the Bible shoulde not haue free passage, veray necessary to be red of euery faythfull Christian.
titleStmt.author: Gerrard, Philip.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the parishe of Christes Church within new gate by Richard Grafton, prynter to our soueraigne lorde Kyng Edward the. vi.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
